items.q: How to request this coach for corporate training?
items.a: Use the WhatsApp button to share your requirements. We will coordinate schedules and program details.

items.q: What are the coach's main areas of expertise?
items.a: Mobile app development (Flutter), AI & ML, Backend with Node.js/PHP, Supabase, Full-stack projects.

items.q: Does the coach have teaching experience?
items.a: Yes. Instructor at Coach Academy (Flutter), Gensystem (Supabase), and Don Bosco Cairo (Informatics).

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, industry-aligned tech coaching.
